definition: to concentrate/to centralize/to focus/centralized/concentrated/to put together
to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

pinyin: Ao4 si1 wei1 xin1 ji2 zhong1 ying2

sentences.english: I worked with Viktor Frankl, a Nazi prison camp survivor, for many years.
sentences.chinese: 長期以來，我曾幫助過一位納粹集中營倖存者。

sentences.english: But this kind of catabolism mainly concentrates on the banana skin.
sentences.chinese: 而這種分解代謝主要集中在香蕉皮上。

sentences.english: One was the discovery by Allied troops of the German death camps.
sentences.chinese: 一個是發現由德國死亡集中營盟軍部隊。

sentences.english: The third part of the study focused on the status of vocational school students bad habits.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分集中考察職校生不良行爲習慣的現狀。

sentences.english: Hanfeizi has reflected Hanfei's political viewpoint in a concentrated way.
sentences.chinese: 《韓非子》集中反映了韓非的政治觀點。

sentences.english: When you find yourself losing focus, get up and take a walk.
sentences.chinese: 當你發現自己開始注意力不集中，你可以站起來走走。

sentences.english: Power-centralized political system is political origin of the debt.
sentences.chinese: 權力集中型政治體制是導致鄉鎮負債的政治根源。

sentences.english: To have centralized logging and security.
sentences.chinese: 具有集中的日誌記錄和安全性。

sentences.english: The favourable prospecting criteria in this region is gold deposits concentration area near the margin…
sentences.chinese: 本區有利的找礦方向是地臺邊緣金礦集中區。

sentences.english: Injecting drug in a short period would be more effective if MEC is relatively high.
sentences.chinese: MEC較大時，比較適合採用短時間集中注射方式。

sentences.english: Additional heat energy is supplied with district heating utilizing geothermally heated water.
sentences.chinese: 額外的熱能由區域集中暖提供，採用地熱加熱的水。

sentences.english: Use vocabulary learning methods to focus quickly on the vocabulary YOU need to study.
sentences.chinese: 用詞彙學習方法來集中學習你需要掌握的詞彙表。

sentences.english: This section concentrates on features of particular relevance to the anesthetist.
sentences.chinese: 本部分將集中探討與麻醉醫生相關的方面。

sentences.english: The domain level focuses strictly on business interactions viewed from the perspective of the external actor.
sentences.chinese: 域層次嚴格集中在從外部演員的角度看到的業務交互。

sentences.english: Local secondary education is concentrated in the provincial capitals and some district centers.
sentences.chinese: 當地的中級教育主要集中在省會和其它一些行政中心。

sentences.english: Democratic centralism is another of our advantages.
sentences.chinese: 再如民主集中制也是我們的優越性。

definition: to scatter/to distribute/to be distributed (over an area etc)/(statistical, geographic) distribution
important point/main point/focus/key (project etc)/to focus on/to put the emphasis on
to recount (e.g. results of election)/to re-evaluate
in large part/the greater part/the majority
for the most part/many/most/the greater part/mostly
to shift/to divert or distract (attention etc)/to change/to transform/metastasis (medicine)/to evacuate (people)
